page.title: 17Nomansland, The Wicked Lady
page.content: In the past Nomansland Common was a place where highwaymen lurked. The ghost of one is supposed to haunt the Common. It is the ghost of Katharine Ferrers who was born in Markyate in 1634. She married very young and was bored so at night she went into a secret room and changed into a highway man's costume and rode 12 km from Markyate to Nomansland Common and held up coaches. She shot anybody who didn't give her their money. One night a guard on the coach shot her but she managed to ride home. The next day one of the servants found her dead in front of her secret room. The family were so shocked they wouldn't bury her in the family grave. There is now a public house called The Wicked Lady on the Common.
